ch0092_40_iris/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s go battle everyone and get tons of candy!
ch0092_40_iris/7101_0701_01_10: Costume events are so much fun!
ch0092_40_iris/7101_0701_02_10:
You get to battle, and they give you candy when
you win...
ch0092_40_iris/7102_0701_01_10:
Check this out! I’m doing a good job of pulling off
this look, right?!
ch0092_40_iris/7102_0701_02_10:
People were telling me how cute it is when I
was walking around earlier, and it made me
so happy!
ch0092_40_iris/7102_0701_03_10:
I always thought costumes were just for
enjoying certain events...
ch0092_40_iris/7102_0701_04_10: But they can also be a fashion statement!
ch0092_40_iris/7103_0701_01_10:
Hey, I bet you didn’t know that Naganadel’s what
we call an Ultra Beast! Also, it’s from another
world!
ch0092_40_iris/7103_0701_02_10:
Other worlds you’ve never seen before may seem
pretty scary, but they’re also pretty exciting! Aren’t
you curious what they’re like?
ch0092_40_iris/7103_0701_03_10:
One day, I wanna visit the world where
Naganadel came from!
ch0092_40_iris/7104_0701_01_10:
Lots of people are scared of ghost Pokémon, but I
don’t really get it.
ch0092_40_iris/7104_0701_02_10:
Naganadel and I may be super different from each
other, but we’re still really good friends!
ch0092_40_iris/7104_0701_03_10:
Even if people and ghost Pokémon are completely
different, I think we can still be friends!
ch0092_40_iris/7105_0701_01_10:
What kind of candy do you like,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0092_40_iris/7105_0701_02_10: If you tell me, I’ll be sure to get some for you!
ch0092_40_iris/7105_0701_03_10: Well... You’ll get it if you can beat me in battle!
ch0092_40_iris/1701_0701_01_10: I have an awesome gift for you!
ch0092_40_iris/1701_0702_01_10: It’s just as good as getting candy, right?
ch0092_40_iris/2501_0701_01_10:
Even if we’re joining an event for fun, we’re still
aiming for number one!
ch0092_40_iris/2501_0701_02_10:
Naganadel and I are strong, so stock up on
candy to give out. Otherwise, you might run out!
ch0092_40_iris/2501_0702_01_10: If you run out of candy...
ch0092_40_iris/2511_0701_01_10:
I went to an event and made a whole bunch of
new friends!
ch0092_40_iris/2511_0701_02_10:
There were humans, of course. But there were lots
of ghost Pokémon, too!
ch0092_40_iris/2511_0701_03_10:
The more friends you have, the more fun you have
at events!
ch0092_40_iris/2511_0702_01_10:
No matter who you’re up against, once you have
a Pokémon battle, it’s super easy to become
friends!
ch0092_40_iris/3001_0701_01_10:
I woke up super early this morning ’cause I was
excited about tonight!
ch0092_40_iris/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m taking a break from battling right now.
Oh! Do you wanna eat some candy with me?
ch0092_40_iris/3005_0701_01_10:
The star of tonight’s battles is gonna be either you
or me!
